column4: Hello. I'm trying to set up a cron job by reading https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CronHowto on 8.10, but I don't have a system->preferences->scheduled tasks. Do I have to apt-get it?
good old way is to do it from cmdline
I'll probably end up doing it that way even if I do it by gui first, but where do I find the gui?
